data.name: Roul Token
data.description:
What is Roul Token (ROUL)?
ROUL is a JACKPOT deflationary token that is fully powered by an automated redistribution mechanism within the blockchain. Every 4 hours you have a chance to win the JACKPOT. A random winner is selected using a custom algorithm based on Solidity Blockhash.  Every transaction has a 10% fee, 5% for jackpot redistributions, 1% is burned, 1% for liquidity pool acquisition, and 3% for operations fees centered around growing the project.

ROUL is the native token for ROUL TOKEN and is used for and will be used for:
•	4 hour redistribution lottery jackpot, 6 per day total
•	Daily redistribution lottery jackpot
•	Weekly redistribution lottery jackpot
•	Roulette Defi aims to provide an ecosystem centered around a investment based rewards mechanism.  Web3 and dapp development design has commenced to bring additional ROUL powered products.

Is it safe to invest in ROUL?
Yes, the team has made all efforts to be as transparent as possible. The presale price was $0.0065 and listed shortly after with a price of $0.0085.  The presale had a limit of 5BNB per wallet and reached the 200BNB hardcap in less than 2 minutes.

As of launch, 85% of the initial liquidity provided has been locked until the year 2100. This is to ensure that there are no rug-pulls and the investment is as safe as possible.  The team has tried to perform audits as soon as possible to gain the trust of the community.  A large portion of the community has claimed their winnings publicly showing that there are real life winners from the Jackpots!  The testimonials can be found on the official ROUL website.

How many ROUL tokens are there in circulation?
ROUL Token launched on Binance Smart Chain main-net on April 11, 2021, with approximately 77 million ROUL tokens minted for the single time. Every transaction has a 1% burn fee which constantly decreases the supply of the token, therefore, pushing the price upwards over time.  Additionally, a 1% transaction fee is allocated for additional liquidity pool acquisition.

Where can I buy ROUL?
ROUL is available for trading on PancakeSwap Decentralized Exchange using the ROUL/BNB pair that has liquidity. PancakeSwap automatically routes to the best liquidity source so it does not matter which token you swap for ROUL.
